item.title: Blue Prince PS5 physical edition announced
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

Due out on November 21 via iam8bit.

iam8bit, in cooperation with publisher Raw Fury and developer Dogubomb, has announced a physical edition of Blue Prince for PlayStation 5. The global retail edition and the iam8bit Exclusive Edition are available to pre-order now and will launch on November 21 for $34.99.

The iam8bit Exclusive Edition includes a copy of the game for PlayStation 5, “a sleek, snug-fitting o-sleeve designed just for this release,” as well as an 18 inches by 12 inches fold-out poster of Mount Holly. All day one editions include a download code for the game’s digital soundtrack.

iam8bit has also announced the following line of Blue Prince collectibles:

  • Blue Prince Keychain Blind Bag – One of twelve collectible keychains, crafted directly from in-game 3D models, with varying levels of rarity. Order a Single Key for $14.99 or a six-key bundle featuring six unique keys for $88.88.
  • Basement Key Replica – A loyal recreation of the in-game item, crafted using the actual 3D models seen on your screen, for $46.00.
  • Mount Holly and Rogue Moon Pin Set – High-quality hard enamel pins emblazoned with the striking symbols hidden around the ever-shifting mansion, built to brave the elements while adorning your lapel, backpack, or pin board, for $19.99.
  • Mount Holly Estate Notebook – A luxe faux-leather hardcover notebook designed for the most meticulous of note-takers, for $19.99.
  • The Red Prince – A faithful recreation of Marion Marigold’s beloved children’s book from the game, hard-bound with cloth-like paper wrapping, for $29.99.

A Commissary Bundle will also be available for $149.99, which includes the iam8bit Exclusive Edition, one of the 12 collectible keychains, basement key replica, Mount Holly and Rogue Moon pin set, Mount Holly Estate notebook, The Red Prince, and a $10 coupon toward a future Blue Prince product.

Blue Prince is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on April 10. It is also available via PlayStation Plus Game Catalog and Game Pass.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/blue-prince-ps5-physical-edition-announced
